Description: Clay tablet; nearly complete; issue of barley as rations at Sippar-yahrurum; seals; Old Babylonian; partially repaired; several loose pieces broken from object.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.220)
Condition: Incomplete; nearly complete; partially repaired; several loose pieces broken from object.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
